item.title: HTML
item.description: Introduction to HTML Getting started with HTML What is HTML? HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is not a programming language; it is a markup language used to tell your browser how to structure the web pages you visit. HTML consists of a series of elements, an element may contain a data item or a chunk of text or an image, or perhaps nothing. A typical element includes an opening tag with
